translated: Elder’s Birth Stories🔽The Chapter with Sālakusumā
“At that time, in the city of Bandhumatī,

analyzed: labujam phalam ādāya  buddha seṭṭhaḥ sadā saha
translated: Taking a labuja fruit,🔽I always served the best Buddha.
the one with great fame accepted it.
and happiness in this very life.
After giving the fruit to the Buddha,
I do not know of any bad destination,
this is the fruit of giving the fruit.
Welcome indeed was it to me,

original: Itthaṁ sudaṁ āyasmā labujaphaladāyako thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
analyzed: ittham sudam āyasmā labujaphaladāyakaḥ theraḥ imāḥ gāthāyaḥ abhāsittha ati
translated: Thus has the venerable elder Labujaphaladāyaka recited these verses.

analyzed: labuja phala dāyaka therassa apadānam sattama
translated: The Story of the Elder Labujaphaladāyaka is finished.
